subject: Handbrake pro connection issues
description_text:
Pro Handbrake is shown as connected on pc but not on simsonn manager, was working previously. I did try to in uninstall all drivers with no success, is there a way to do a factory reset on this device? Even after deleting and re installing drivers the LED light remains off which is how I had set it before losing the ability to adjust through simsonn manager.

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: Hi scott krause,    If the issue persists, we recommend installing Todesk (no registration required). Simply provide your ID and temporary access code, and we can schedule a time to assist you remotely.         https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

I’ll be on my pc if you’ve got time, otherwise I’m happy to schedule

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

Hi scott krause,   Your current software version is too old, and I’m unable to connect. Please download and install the latest version, then try again.       https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

Updated, also I lost pedal connection as well

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

Pulling order info now

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
